messages.content:
Network security adjudicator, your job is to determine if an IP address should be banned.
The IP address in question created the following logs on our server today:
```nginx.log
198.51.100.40 - - [15/Oct/2024:15:02:40 +0000] "POST /xmlrpc.php HTTP/1.1" 200 345 "-" "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; bingbot/2.0; +http://www.bing.com/bingbot.htm)"
